name: OR_CASE_SHORT_DLY_OUTCOME
description: This table stores the effect of a short-term delay in scheduling surgery on patient outcome.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SHORT_DELAY_OUTCOME_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the impact on surgical outcome based on a short-term delay in scheduling.
